sourcesContent:
// import {get, post} from "@/utils/request.js";

export const bindRegister = (data) => post(`/api/v1/user/register`,data,{bizName:"MFT"});//注册
export const bindLogin = (data) => post(`/api/v1/user/login`,data,{bizName:"MFT"});//登录
export const bindLogout = () => post(`/api/v1/user/logout`,{});//退出登录
export const bindIsLogin = () => post(`/api/v1/user/isLogin`,{});//是否登录
export const bindCheckUserRegister = (data) => post(`/api/v1/user/checkUserRegisted`,data);//校验用户是否注册
export const bindCheckPwdPattern = (data) => post(`/api/v1/user/checkPwdPattern`,data);//校验密码是否满足条件
export const bindResetPwd = (data) => post(`/api/v1/user/resetPwd`,data,{bizName:"MFT"});//修改密码

export  const getCountryCode = () => post(`/api/v1/code/getCountryCodeForRegion`,{});//获取国家区号
export const bindSendVaildCode = (data) => post(`/api/v1/code/sendVaildCodeNew`,data,{businessName:"MFT"});//发送验证码
export const bindCheckValidCode = (data) => post(`/api/v1/code/checkValidCode`,data);//校验验证码
